title: Bonus - Not Just a Water Crisis: The Decline of Jackson, Mississippi
itunes:title: Bonus - Not Just a Water Crisis: The Decline of Jackson, Mississippi
description: Dr. Mauda Monger is a lifelong resident of Jackson, Mississippi. She is also a community advocate and public health professional. She talks with Dr. Sharfstein about how the water crisis is the most visible sign of a profound decline in her hometown and perhaps could help bring about a brighter future. Dr. Monger runs an initiative for young women of color in Jackson called the S-H-E Project. Learn more
